questions.question_text: Matching of parentheses is a feature of Splunk Assistant.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Matching of parentheses is not a specific feature of Splunk Assistant. Instead, it is a general Splunk Search Processing Language (SPL) editor feature, which helps users by highlighting matching parentheses for better query accuracy

Selected Answer: B
Yes, Matching of parentheses is a feature of Splunk Assistant.

Selected Answer: A
This means that when an end parenthesis is typed, the corresponding beginning parenthesis is highlighted, and if a matching beginning parenthesis cannot be found, nothing is highlighted. This behavior helps users identify mismatched parentheses.

Selected Answer: A
The option for Splunk assistant can be turned on or off, but the matching of parentheses is a feature of the 'Splunk search interface' itself and will work when Splunk assistant is off.

Selected Answer: B
When an end parenthesis is typed, the corresponding beginning
parenthesis is automatically highlighted.
If a beginning parenthesis cannot be found, nothing is highlighted.

Selected Answer: B
In Splunk, the Search Assistant is enabled by default in the SPL editor with compact settings. It provides query suggestions, syntax help, and field recommendations to improve search efficiency. Users can adjust these settings in Splunk's preferences if needed.

Selected Answer: A
No, While Search Assistant is a valuable tool, it's not enabled by default in the compact

B. YES Page 55.
Search assistant is enabled by default in the SPL Editor user preferences. By default, compact is selected. To show more information, choose Full.

questions.question_text: Search Assistant is enabled by default in the SPL editor with compact settings.
What is Search Assistant in Splunk?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Search Assistant is a helpful feature in Splunk that provides suggestions to complete

Selected Answer: C
C is correct

choices.A: It is only available to Admins.
choices.B: Such feature does not exist in Splunk.
choices.C: Shows options to complete the search string.
